```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(best_shlw, aes(x=Genus, y=average_N15, fill=Region)) + 
   geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge()) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=average_N15-SD_N15, ymax=average_N15+SD_N15), width=.2, position=position_dodge(.9))+ scale_fill_manual(values = c("red2", 'forestgreen')) + labs(y= expression(paste(delta^{15}, 'N (‰)'), x = 'Genus'))

ggplot(best_shlw, aes(x=Genus, y=average_per, fill=Region)) + 
   geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge()) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=average_per-SD_per, ymax=average_per+SD_per), width=.2, position=position_dodge(.9))+ scale_fill_manual(values = c("red2", 'forestgreen')) + labs(y= expression(paste('N (%)'), x = 'Genus'))
```
